input.label: Select Environment:
input.populatingSearch: | metadata type=hosts `collectd_index` | search totalCount>0 | eval host=replace(host,"_",".") | eval fields=split(host,".") | eval stage=mvindex(fields,1) | eval environment=mvindex(fields,2) | eval env=tostring(environment + "_" + stage) | eval envdata=tostring(stage + "." + environment) | dedup env | sort env | regex env="^[^\d]" | table env envdata

input.label: Select Host:
input.populatingSearch: | metadata type=hosts `collectd_index` | search host=*$env$* totalCount>0 | dedup "host" | sort "host" | regex host="^[^\d]" | eval hostreplace=replace(host,"_",".") | eval host=replace(host,"_",".") | table host hostreplace

chart.title: Processes by state over time for $hostselected$
chart.searchString: `collectd_index` host="*$env$*" host=$hostselected$ (ps_state_sleeping=* OR ps_state_blocked=* OR ps_state_running=* OR ps_state_zombies=* ) | timechart avg(ps_state_sleeping) as sleeping max(ps_state_running) as running max(ps_state_blocked) as blocked max(ps_state_zombies) as zombies | eval running=round (running) | eval sleeping = round (sleeping) | eval blocked = round (blocked) | eval zombies = round(zombies)

table.title: Processes by state over time for $hostselected$
table.searchString:
`collectd_index` host="*$env$*" host=$hostselected$ (ps_state_sleeping=* OR ps_state_blocked=* OR ps_state_running=* OR ps_state_zombies=* ) |
timechart max(ps_state_sleeping) as sleeping max(ps_state_running) as running max(ps_state_blocked) as blocked max(ps_state_zombies) as zombies by host | eval running=round (running) | eval sleeping = round (sleeping) | eval blocked = round (blocked) | eval zombies = round(zombies)
